Coding Skill

The coding skills i have learned so far.

Intro
I'm a self-thaught programmer and i've been doing this for almost 2 years. In those years i've been struggling with choosing which career path i should take. I first thought about learning Web development specifically Frontend development since it is beginner friendly. So i put my time in learning HTML, CSS ⩓ JavaScript. It took me sometime to figure out what the terminologies are and how the web works. After a while i was able to build small projects.
Then i wanted to build a backend for my small projects and i found out i need to learn a differt programming language for the backend. My first choice was PHP but somebody recommended me PYTHON. Python is easy to learn and has a very supportive community.
After i learned all the basics and advanced topics of the language, i was sure i could do more than developing web. Now i am taking online courses on Machine learning because nowadays the world is developing complex AI technologies and i believe machine learning is a major subfield in AI.

Future goal
Now the altimate goal for me is AI program.
I want to get my hands on everything AI requires. Like Computer Science, Data Science, Deep Learning and of caurse Machine Learning. I'm already building small projects with the knowledge i have gathered so far. The good thing about this generation is if you dont know something or you got stuck building a project, thanks to the internet you can get a help right-away.
Lastly i would love to share my projects when they are ready.
Thanks for reading.
